thread.title: Catherine
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Catherine

author: Catherine
title: Catherine
text: I'm so glad I came across Country Attire when looking for a new wax jacket in the New Year! I have always bought another well-known brand, but from now on Country Attire is my brand of choice. Their service is excellent, and the jacket is so beautifully finished and has extra little touches, like a chain loop for hanging it up instead of a cotton one - it also comes with a 2-year guarantee. Add the fact that the sizing is generous, so that I don't have to order one or even two sizes bigger than normal(!), and they're on a winner as far as I'm concerned. If the dark navy jacket I bought had been available in black too, I would have bought another one instantly. Love this company!
